definition: Tang Bohu 唐伯虎 or Tang Yin (1470-1523), Ming painter and poet, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
3rd earthly branch: 3-5 a.m., 1st solar month (4th February-5th March), year of the Tiger/ancient Chinese compass point: 60°

sentences.english: Tang Bohu, or Tang Yin, a Chinese scholar and painter in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎，名唐寅，明代的画家，学者。
